org.kitodo.services.data.base

Class SearchService<T extends BaseBean>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.kitodo.services.data.base.SearchService<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FilterService, HistoryService, TemplateService, TitleSearchService, UserService, WorkpieceService

    public abstract class SearchService<T extends BaseBean>
extends Object
    Class for implementing methods used by all service classes which search in ElasticSearch index.

      • save

        public void save(T baseBean)
          throws DataException
        Method saves object to database and document to the index of Elastic Search. This method binds three other methods: save to database, save to index and save dependencies to index.

        First step sets up the flag indexAction to state Index and saves to database. It informs that object was updated in database but not yet in index. If this step fails, method breaks. If it is successful, method saves changes to index, first document and next its dependencies. If one of this steps fails, method retries up to 5 times operations on index. If it continues to fail, method breaks. If save to index was successful, indexAction flag is changed to Done and database is again updated. There is possibility that last step fails and in that case, even if index is up to date, in some point of the future it will be reindexed by administrator.

        Parameters:
        baseBean - object
        Throws:
        DataException

      • createSimpleQuery

        protected org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder createSimpleQuery(String key,
                                                                       Integer id,
                                                                       boolean contains)
        Used for cases where operator is not necessary to create query - checking only for one parameter.
        Parameters:
        key - JSON key for searched object
        id - id value for searched object or some object related to searched object
        contains - determine if results should contain given value or should not contain given value
        Returns:
        query

      • createSimpleQuery

        protected org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder createSimpleQuery(String key,
                                                                       String value,
                                                                       boolean contains)
        Used for cases where operator is not necessary to create query - checking only for one parameter.
        Parameters:
        key - JSON key for searched object
        value - JSON value for searched object
        contains - determine if results should contain given value or should not contain given value
        Returns:
        query

      • createSimpleQuery

        protected org.elasticsearch.index.query.QueryBuilder createSimpleQuery(String key,
                                                                       String value,
                                                                       boolean contains,
                                                                       org.elasticsearch.index.query.Operator operator)
        Used for cases where operator is necessary to create query - checking for more than one parameter.
        Parameters:
        key - JSON key for searched object
        value - JSON value for searched object
        contains - determine if results should contain given value or should not contain given value
        operator - as Operator AND or OR - useful when value contains more than one word
        Returns:
        query
